instructions: Tap the App Store app. Tap Updates . Tap your account icon in the top right corner (this may be a photo, if you've added one to your Apple ID ). Tap Purchased . (You may also need to tap My Purchases , if you use Family Sharing .) The list of apps defaults to All apps, but you can also tap Not on this iPhone just to see apps not currently installed. Tap the download button (the cloud with the down arrow in it).
